name: Missing Song Titles Trivia Quiz | Music Mixture | 25 Questions

questions.text: '--- Took The Words Right Out Of My Mouth'?
questions.explanation:
You & you.

	'You Took The Words Right Out Of My Mouth' Meat Loaf (20th May 1978)

Girls & girls.

	'Girls Just Want To Have Fun' Cyndi Lauper (14th Jan. 1984)

New & new.

	'New York Mining Disaster 1941' Bee Gees (27th Apr. 1967)

Only & only.

	'Only The Lonely' Roy Orbison (28th Jul. 1960)

Love & love.

	'Love Me Do' The Beatles (11 Oct. 1962)

questions.text: '-------- I Lay My Hat (That's My Home)'?
questions.explanation:
Wherever & wherever.

	'Wherever I Lay My Hat (That's My Home)' Paul Young (18 Jun. 1983)

Whiskey & whiskey.

	'Whiskey In The Jar' Thin Lizzy (20th Jan. 1973)

Second & second.

	'Second Hand Rose' Barbra Streisand (20 Jan. 1966)

To & to.

	'To Cut A Long Story Short' Spandau Ballet (15th Nov. 1980)

No & no.

	'No Woman No Cry' Bob Marley and the Wailers (27th Sep. 1975)

Too & too.

	'Too Late For Goodbyes' Julian Lennon (6 Oct. 1984)

Give & give.

	'Give Peace A Chance' John Lennon (9th Jul 1969)

Sultans & sultans.

	'Sultans Of Swing' Dire Straits (10 Mar. 1979)

Walking & walking.

	'Walking On Sunshine' Katrina and the Waves (4th May 1985)

Got & got.

	'Got To Be There' Michael Jackson (12 Feb. 1972)

Watching & watching.

	'Watching The Detectives' Elvis Costello (5 Nov. 1977)

Dreaming & dreaming.

	'Dreaming Of Me' Depeche Mode (4th Apr. 1981)

Planet & planet.

	'Planet Earth' Duran Duran (21 Feb. 1981)

Whispering & whispering.

	'Whispering Grass' Windsor Davies and Don Estelle (17 May 1975)

Everybody & everybody.

	'Everybody Salsa' Modern Romance (15th Aug. 1981)

Red & red.

	'Red Frame White Light' Orchestral Manoeuvres In The Dark' (9th Feb 1980)

Kids & kids.

	'Kids In America' Kim Wilde (21 Feb. 1981)

Oxygene & oxygene.

	'Oxygene Part IV' Jean-Michel Jarre (27th Aug. 1977)

Gentlemen & gentlemen.

	'Gentlemen Take Polaroids' Japan (18th Oct. 1980)

Another & another.

	'Another Day' Paul McCartney (22 Feb. 1971) I know questions 23-25 were rock (if you pardon the pun) but I hope you still enjoyed the quiz. If you find any alternative answers please let me know. Cheers Quizzical.
